@dralycemcgovern Thanks.
@OrtiOricellari Thanks!
@hmberents Never again shall we speak of such horror.
@Pool_Depth1_1 Thanks! It's been a *long* time coming, this one, and I'm pleased to have sent it off (pleased to quietly think it's ok too).
Submitted new book to publisher. Regretting lack of sofa and drinks cabinet in office. (Also not sure if celebration or lie-down is req'd.)
@merylkenny @WillClapton Thanks muchly, Dr Kenny.
@SaraMeger Thanks!
Free access to much goodies, incl. our Game of Thrones article, Dr C: https://t.co/j0TCfGYWcm @WillClapton https://t.co/zW6O6irmFx
@Pool_Depth1_1 Now that's a sensible contribution to *any* argument ðŸ˜‰ But about this 'newness'...
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P I don't think it's b/c they're ours. I think it's b/c they're not intellegible as facts w/in current reality.
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P Ageed (w/in the meta-regime of the existence of Fact and Truth).
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P Unless is contextual. In which case, turtles are queuing at the back door again.
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P I asked Does Fact derive from objective/material reality or from discourse? And you said both. Not differentiated.
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P That's just a fancy way of saying QED and I don't see it that way. I reject your reality and substitute my own ðŸ˜‰
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P Not Truth itself.
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P But evaluating b/w the truthiness of the facts that are contested relies on acceptance of regime of truth
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P Of course there are multiple "'we's". And Trump's "we's" accept some of my facts, and I some of theirs.
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P Which I think brings the turtles in again by the back door.
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P It's turtles all the way down or it's not, surely? Or challenge the discourse/matter dichotomy itself.
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P Never again going to try and articulate discourse theory of reality in 140 characters at a time. LJS out. (16)
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P But b/c we attribute Fact its privilege and authority in our particular context (hence, socially constructed) (15)
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P But I make that distinction not by deferring to Fact as the source of authority *because it is Fact* (14)
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P It renders them less credible than the other, actual, facts (13)
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P So w/in that context I can identify alt-facts b/c of way regime of truth we acknowledge as reality functions (12)
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P Rather than itself being a (very powerful) regime of truth (see also Science) (11)
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P Not so, b/c that relies on acceptance that Fact derives authority from correspondence w/ objective reality (10)
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P Or accept that all facts â€“ Trump facts, alt-facts, flat-out lies â€“ are equivalent, both politically and morally (9)
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P You seem to suggest that if I critique certain â€˜factsâ€™, I have to acknowldge objective reality of Fact (8)
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P Is â€˜Factâ€™ an attribution that derives from an objective/material reality or can â€˜Fact derive from discourse? (7)
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P W/in that reality there are multiple competing knowledge claims, hence contested nature of both facts & â€˜Factâ€™ (6)
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P [Aside: Donâ€™t forget reality was flat earth and There Be Dragons not so long ago (5)]
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P Discourse theory says this is a regime of truth rather than objective truth: reality is socially constructed (4)
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P We â€“ you, me, Trump, most people â€“ operate w/in a social context we identify as reality. (3)
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P Debate here is over nature of reality but confusion is in distinction b/w Fact vsâ€˜factsâ€™ & level of analysis (2)
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P @colwight @timdunneAPR2P Trump absolutely is part of that 'we'. Ok, here goes... (1)
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P The truth we call reality which is still a social (I'd say discursive) construction (the ultimate regime of truth)
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P We know why some truths are truthier: b/c individual truths are evaluated against the greatest of all truths...
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P Why is it the case that some truths are truthier?
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P I don't have to be an empiricist to recognise the power of empiricism in current truth regime
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P fact/truth are contextual but that doesn't mean anything goes. Hence mockery of alt-facts.
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P b/c w/in given regime of truth (incl. valorisation of empirical evidence) some truths are truthier than others
@robdover 'We may retain an archived copy of your records as required by law or for legitimate business purposes'. Ho hum.
#alternativefacts https://t.co/7M0smm4VxR
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P Well, yes, if you are so inclined. Or you explore how 'their' facts are different from 'your' facts and why.
@colwight But, things that social construction *doesn't* mean: https://t.co/NnrQpxXoMs
@chrismayLU yeeeees, but did you read the bit about ownership and rights?
@colwight @timdunneAPR2P Facts are a social construction. Alternative facts are a social construction. The discourse theorists are loving it
So, Facebook is gone, https://t.co/mc40Ac4FKv is next (as long as I can remember the password...) https://t.co/TBg2pLtzd1

So this is the advice from Chicago on citing trans authors by deadnames: https://t.co/QQ70leF8XZ. Thoughts? Feels awkward to me.
Woken to a timeline that's an awesome sea of pink and fearlessness. Humbled by and grateful for the #womensmarch worldwide. Solidarity ftw.
Now, numbers aren't my good thing, but... https://t.co/uzA6bcNBi3
On the importance of collective action. https://t.co/aPaqnsivAk
In other news, I can't wait to do the proofs. No, really.
It's beaten me. 20 pages to go (though we all know that's a lie) and I cannot go on. I will dream of tiny numbers tonight.
The worst thing about formatting refs is that the doc gets longer the longer you work on it. It's fiendish.
@JonPiccini That's positively polite compared to what I've been muttering under my breath.
I would rather eat a bucket of spiders than ever see this pop-up again ever. Ever. https://t.co/hCYCoEFnvJ
@hmberents I'm on p.189 and am weeping inside.
Now I'm talking to the references: 'Donald or Donnie... Can I call you Donnie?... You're footnote 578 NO ONE WILL EVER KNOW OR CARE'.
Oh, and 2016 me who decided authorial initials would be JUST FINE has got some serious apologising to do.
@ipeterharris Now I have order-paranoia to go with my RSI and the collapse of my neural networks. TYSM. <ctrl-F bananas>
Still formatting references. I just forgot how to spell 'bananas'. Send help.
Inauguration of #Unpresidented President to watch? ... Actually I'll carry on with the manuscript, thanks.
Drains to unblock?
400 page strategy document to translate into human-speak?
Anyone got a venomous snake that needs wrangling?
250 footnotes/ 100 pages in.
Reformatting a WHOLE MS from in-text to footnote refs but then I remember it's Trump's inauguration today. Perspective ftw.
